description.paragraph: This add-on parses text parts of HTML pages to match hypertext patterns not correctly encoded (i.e. not part of an anchor) and add an anchor to enable a standard mouse click to access the target as specified by the hypertext. The functionality is the same as the Linkification add-on, but because this add-on seems no longer maintained, Linkificator add-on could be used as a replacement. WARNING: Because this add-on does same transformations as Linkification add-on, it is required to deactivate or de-install this add-on to ensure a correct behavior. This version have the following known limitations and bugs: Due to Add-on SDK limitations, For Firefox until version 28.0, it is not possible to remove Linkificator widget from the Add-on bar using standard method. Instead, use Linkificator option 'Display widget in the Add-on Bar'. Starting with Firefox version 29.0, this limitation does not exist anymore: you can use standard customization work-flows to manage Linkificator widget. Icons by: FastIcon.com Localization infrastructure: Crowdin.com

For any bug report or question regarding Linkificator, the preferred method is to send to me an e-mail (see Support E-mail on Add-on page). Help is welcomed to manage various localization. For that purpose, send-me an e-mail (see Support E-mail on Add-on page) to request translation materials.
